import sys

n = int(sys.stdin.readline().strip())
s = sys.stdin.readline().strip()

ans = 0
for i in range(1, n):
    if ord(s[i - 1]) == ord(s[i]) - 1 or ord(s[i - 1]) == ord(s[i]) - 2:
        ans += 1
        s = s[:i - 1] + s[i + 1:]
print(ans)

import sys

s = sys.stdin.readline().strip()
n = int(sys.stdin.readline().strip())

ans = 0

for i in range(n):
    if i == 0:
        if s[i] == 'a':
            ans += 1
            s = s[1:]
            n -= 1
        elif s[i] == 'b':
            ans += 1
            s = s[1:]
            n -= 1
        elif s[i] == 'c':
            ans += 1
            s = s[1:]
            n -= 1
        elif s[i] == 'd':
            ans += 1
            s = s[1:]
            n -= 1
        elif s[i] == 'e':
            ans += 1
            s = s[1:]
            n -= 1
        elif s[i] == 'f':
            ans += 1
            s = s[1:]
            n -= 1
        elif s[i] == 'g':
            ans += 1
            s = s[1:]
            n -= 1
